languages.text:
Система авгуров, подключенная к могучим когитационным блокам, дарованным Эксплораторами. Их вычислительная мощь столь велика, что авгуры улавливают даже мельчайшие слабости в броне врага.
~// −10% к уклонению врагов

This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}
languages.original_text:
Система авгуров, подключенная к могучим когитационным блокам, дарованным Эксплораторами. Их вычислительная мощь столь велика, что авгуры улавливают даже мельчайшие слабости в броне врага.
~// −10% к уклонению врагов

traits.locale_text: Augur system connected to the mighty cogitation blocks of the ancient data-engine known as Null Caliph. Its computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in the enemy's defences.

Augur system connected to the mighty cogitation blocks of the ancient data-engine known as Null Caliph. Its computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in the enemy's defences.

This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their evasion

This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

languages.text:
El sistema de augures está conectado a los bloques de cogitación ofrecidos por los exploradores a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su poder de computación es tan grande que los augures pueden detectar la más mínima vulnerabilidad de las defensas enemigas.
~// Los enemigos pierden −10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g}
languages.original_text:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

traits.locale_text: Sistema de augures conectado a los bloques de cogitación del antiguo telar de datos conocido como Null Caliph. Su poder de computación es tan grande que los augures pueden detectar la más mínima vulnerabilidad de las defensas enemigas.

languages.text:
Ce système d'augures est relié aux puissants blocs de cogitation offerts par les Explorators. Sa puissance de calcul est telle qu'il peut déceler la plus petite faille dans les défenses de l'ennemi.
~// L'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} des ennemis est réduite de −10 %.
languages.original_text:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

traits.locale_text:
Ce système d'augures est relié aux puissants blocs de cogitation offerts par les Explorators. Sa puissance de calcul est telle qu'il peut déceler la plus petite faille dans les défenses de l'ennemi.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}L'évasion{/g} des ennemis est réduite de −10 %.

languages.text:
这个俄歇矩阵系统是开拓者舰队送给行商浪人的礼物。它的计算能力非常惊人，有了它，俄歇矩阵可以轻易捕捉到敌人防御系统中最细小的漏洞。
~// 所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}率降低10%。
languages.original_text:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

traits.locale_text: 这个俄歇矩阵系统与远古数据梭机“虚无哈里发”的强大认知模块相连。它的计算能力非常惊人，有了它，俄歇矩阵可以轻易捕捉到敌人防御系统中最细小的漏洞。

这个俄歇矩阵系统是开拓者舰队送给行商浪人的礼物。它的计算能力非常惊人，有了它，俄歇矩阵可以轻易捕捉到敌人防御系统中最细小的漏洞。
~// 所有敌人的闪避率降低10%。

languages.text:
このオーガーシステムは、エクスプロレイターがローグトレーダーへの贈り物として提供した強力なコギテーション・ブロックに接続されている。その計算能力は非常に高く、敵の防御のわずかな脆弱性さえも見つけ出すことができる。
~// 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避率{/g}が−10%減少する
languages.original_text:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

traits.locale_text: スキャンシステムは、ヌル・カリフとして知られる古代のデータルームの強力な考算機ブロックに接続されている。その計算能力は非常に高く、敵の防御のわずかな脆弱性さえも見つけ出すことができる。

このオーガーシステムは、エクスプロレイターがローグトレーダーへの贈り物として提供した強力なコギテーション・ブロックに接続されている。その計算能力は非常に高く、敵の防御のわずかな脆弱性さえも見つけ出すことができる。
~// 敵の回避率が−10%減少する

languages.text:
Das Augurensystem ist mit den mächtigen Cogitationsblöcken verbunden, die ein Geschenk der Exploratoren an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} darstellen. Ihre Rechenkraft ist so gewaltig, dass die Auguren selbst die kleinsten Schwachstellen in der Verteidigung des Feindes erkennen können.
~// Gegner erhalten −10 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g}
languages.original_text:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

traits.locale_text: Augurensystem, das mit den mächtigen Cogitationsblöcken des uralten Datenwebstuhls Null Caliph verbunden ist. Die Rechenkraft ist so gewaltig, dass die Auguren selbst die kleinsten Schwachstellen in der Verteidigung des Feindes erkennen können.

Das Augurensystem ist mit den mächtigen Cogitationsblöcken verbunden, die ein Geschenk der Exploratoren an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} darstellen. Ihre Rechenkraft ist so gewaltig, dass die Auguren selbst die kleinsten Schwachstellen in der Verteidigung des Feindes erkennen können.
~// Gegner erhalten −10 % auf Ausweichen

languages.text:
Bu alamet sistemi, Keşiftörler tarafından Hür Tacir'e armağan olarak sunulan güçlü kavramsayar bloklarına bağlıdır. Bu blokların hesaplama gücü öylesine yüksektir ki alametler, düşman savunmasındaki en ufak bir açığı bile yakalayabilmektedir.
~// Düşmanlar, −%10 {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değerine maruz kalır
languages.original_text:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}
